categories: Category:Imperial Navy pilots of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: FG-53-5 was a Human male TIE pilot who served the Galactic Empire during the Galactic Civil War.
In 1 ABY, FG-53-5 was part of a TIE pilot unit that guarded a statue of Emperor Palpatine installed in front of the Theed Royal Palace on Naboo during that year's Empire Day celebrations.
FG-53-5 was a Non-Player Character (NPC) in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. He made appearances during the Empire Day live events of 2009.
